long_description: Use the Apollo sit-on-top kayak center section to extend your Point 65 Apollo sit-on-top kayak from a single to a tandem. Center piece fits between bow and stern sections of the Apollo and extends the length. Locking piece offers confidence-inspiring stability and quick assembly time. Center section features s a padded backrest and padded cushion that offer comfortable support; backrest folds down during storage. The tandem configuration of the Apollo is approximately 12 ft. 9 in. long and weighs approximately 60 lbs. Adding the center section to the Apollo kayak increases capacity by approximately 265 lbs. for a total of 530 lbs.
short_description: Use the Apollo sit-on-top kayak center section to extend your Point 65 Apollo sit-on-top kayak from a single to a tandem.
